I'm unable to compile NEAT C++ on FC5. Running make gives dozens of
errors.=
 The docs say NEAT was designed to compile under Linux. I
confirmed I have =
Fedora's gtkmm24-devel package installed. What am I
doing wrong?

Regards,
=
Chris
